tuning.
3) We mostly depend on heuristics to select
the weight matrices to apply LoRA to. Are

there more principled ways to do it? 4) Finally,
the rank-deﬁciency of ∆W suggests that W could
be rank-deﬁcient as well, which can also be a source of inspiration for future works.
